title: The two new Hextech items are so ugly :/
body: Both the item thumbnails AND the actives. Like, how freaking wierd will it look if I just dash forward 300 units as Ahri, this foxy spirtual energy champion, and shoot like 6 rockets out of me....

replies.body: They don't just look bad, they're kinda stupid as an AP item. Like, dashing forward and shooting 6 rockets out of you, just seems like a desperation act to me from Riot.

The Haxtech Starburst is best for Annie, Swain, Galio, or any champion that requires gap closer to 100-0.
Expecting permaban of these champs in the upcoming patch.
Right? It feels like they're either trying to re-enact Dota 2 or are reaching too hard to keep the game fresh and interesting.
I believe the thumbnails for the items are temporary.
He's talking about the in-game visuals. Doesn't really make sense for icicles to come out of ahri or rockets to fly out of malzahar.
